item.description:
Australian singer Kate Miller-Heidke is playing live at 9PM, Thursday 21st July at T.T. The Bear's Place in Cambridge.  For those who've been away from Oz for awhile, she broke through into the "mainstream" Aussie music scene a few years ago with the release of her single The Last Day on Earth (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KhQ5seprs6s).

Her latest album Nightflight was released this year and went #1 in Australia on ITunes.   Let's get along and support a seriously talented Australian musician who's yet to break-through in the U.S.A.

Venue is really easy to get to on the Red-Line, get off at Central Square then head up MASS avenue to 10 Brookline St.  Best of all, the gig is only $9!

Details on the concert and a link to purchase are at - http://www.songkick.com/concerts/12645918-kate-millerheidke-at-tt-the-bears-place.  Doesn't appear to be sold-out, so may be able to get tickets at the door on the night.

The box office opens at 6 pm and the bar opens at 8.30 pm. We will meet in the bar.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet inside the venue - Bar opens at 8.30 pm

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Kate Miller-Heidke - Live at T.T. the Bear's Place
